entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 19. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
